item.title: IPL Calibrated Color Image Database
item.description: Table of Contents About the Color Image Database Why a New Color Image Database? Calibration and Experimental Procedure Organization of the Database About the Color Image Database The database consists of 130 calibrated color images of natural objects under calibrated illuminations: Calibrated images: images are given in CIE XYZ tristimulus values. Natural objects: imply complex textures, mutual illumination, and shadows, which induce non-linear effects in the tristimulus values. Calibrated illuminations: include diffuse CIE D65 and diffuse CIE A illuminant.
